# Timber Pizza Co

809 Upshur St. NW, Washington, DC, 20011, USA

$ · Pizza

###### Reservations are not available for this restaurant on our site

 [Find bookable restaurants near me](/us/en/restaurants/online-reservation)

# Timber Pizza Co

809 Upshur St. NW, Washington, DC, 20011, USA

$ · Pizza

Now with multiple locations, Timber Pizza Co is a popular neighborhood hangout that's always buzzing. It's first-come, first-serve here, where you'll likely spy a never-ending stack of to-go orders being whisked out the door. So, what’s all the fuss about? It’s the flavorful cooking, of course. A few bites into the Griffin salad and it’s clear this kitchen knows how to handle itself. Those in the know order a half and half to explore the wide variety of pizzas, available in red, white or green sauce pies. You can't go wrong with a classic Neapolitan-style pizza with puréed tomato sauce, gooey mozzarella and thick pepperoni coins, but choose The Lot for a sauce-less pie topped with shredded braised pork, shaved bread, butter jalapeños and a sweet and spicy pineapple chups.

[Facilities & Services](javascript:void(0);)   [Visit Website](https://www.timberpizza.com/)   [+1 202-853-9746](tel:+1 202-853-9746)
